The Jiangxi Fengcheng Qujiang Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Qujiang Town, Fengcheng City, Yichun, Jiangxi Province

operators: Fengcheng Qujiang Coal Development Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Fengcheng Qujiang Coal Development Co Ltd and owned by Jiangxi Coal Group Corporation.
